body.name: ArtCreativity Light Up Transparent Airplane Toy for Kids, 1PC, Bump and Go Kids Airplane with Colorful Moving Gears, Music, and LED Effects, Toy Airplane For Toddlers 1-3, Fun Toddler Boy Toys Ages 3+
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 22 hrs 3 mins
features: FUEL THE EXCITEMENT: An airplane toy that takes fun to eye-catching extremes! This transparent airplane for kids is crammed with features. It lights up, it plays music, it moves on its own, and it even has colorful gears that turn in spectacular style. Measures 8.25” long x 8” wide x 5” tall and it takes 3 X AA batteries to power the musical toy car. (Batteries included)

BUMP N’ GO MECHANISM: Little airplane lovers will be transfixed with excitement as they observe the coolness. Each time this light-up plane toy hits a barrier, it automatically changes direction and keeps cruising; all thanks to the cool bump and go action engine.

EDUCATIONAL TOY: Get your kids off the screen and busy learning with these toys for girls and boys. They are great for developing educational skills like shape recognition, creativity, hand-eye coordination, gross motor skills, problem-solving skills, and cognitive processes.

MEMORIES THEY’LL CHERISH: Get on the floor, join in on the fun, and bond with your kiddo the extra-exciting way! Bump-and-go toys are a great opportunity to spend quality time with little ones. They also foster independence during solo play and social skills during group play.

GREAT GIFT IDEA: Birthday, holiday, or anything in between, this bump and go toy plane makes a memorable treat for boys and girls. You’ll love the high-quality plastic that withstands all the action. Also great as a game prize or gift shop item. For kids 3+

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BUMP N’ GO MECHANISM Get those gears of imagination spinning and the smiles sparking! This is it: the toy that will have that little aviation lover occupied for hours. Just turn it on, place it on the floor, and watch it change directions whenever it hits a barrier. FUEL THE EXCITEMENT An airplane toy that takes fun to eye-catching extremes! This transparent airplane for kids is crammed with features. It lights up, it plays music, it moves on its own, and it even has colorful gears that turn in spectacular style. GREAT GIFT IDEA Birthday, holiday, or anything in between, this bump and go toy plane makes a memorable treat for boys and girls. You’ll love the high-quality plastic that withstands all the action. Also great as a game prize or gift shop item. For kids 3+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very cool toy! Lights up,moves around, and is clear to see the gear movement. I wish the back wing would stay on a little better- a click in mechanism would jave been ideal. My 3 year old LOVES this toy. The only thing that could be better would be a volume adjustment button. It is a rather loud toy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun Little Toy
reviews.reviewText: My Grandson loves this toy. Fun little plane with lights, sound and movement. A good first toy plane for kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My son loves it. Only thing it’s too loud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very noisy but it is a toy and the kids love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great gift for my grandbaby
reviews.reviewText: I bought this item because my grandson loves the fire truck version of this toy. Sometimes he goes a while without playing with it and when i turn it on his face lights up like he has never seen the toy before..lol. He loves the fire truck and the airplane. It is a great toy for gifting. It truly has a lot of lights, makes noise, and it automatically rolls, and reverse is something blocks it. NOTE: you must remove the cover over the wheels.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice but it broke immediately
reviews.reviewText: It is very nice (lights, sounds, movements) but it broke immediately, unfortunately

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fun thing for all family
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. We bought it as a Christmas present for our 2.5 years son. I don't know who is more excited with it... we are or our son )))

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Worked for 1/2 hour
reviews.reviewText: My grandson was delighted with the airplane until it quit working. It only worked for a half an hour, and then it was a broken toy. The lights the sound hall quit on it, and it no longer worked.
